name: Escape of Pig
description:
Friends in need know each other.

Escape of Pig is a casual-thinking game where your mission is to help the pigs to escape.

The poor pig was stuck between the boxes that surround him... Help him and his friends to get out of the tangle to freedom. Use imagination and logical thinking to succeed in reuniting the family that was. It seems that the only hope is only in you. Become everyone's hero right now!

Game Features :
- 18 levels
- Stuck piggies
- One way out
- Difficulty is increasing with each new level
